Miscellaneous Stuff

Currency

Coin Pence Mark Crown Sovereign
Pence 1 10 100 1000
Mark - 1 10 100
Crown - - 1 10
Sovereign - - - 1

The pence is a round copper coin with a square hole in the middle.

The mark is a pentagonal-shaped silver coin depicting a eagle. Commoners refer to the mark as an eagle.

The crown is a hexagonal-shaped gold coin depicting a lion. Commoners refer to the crown as a lion.

The sovereign is a octagonal-shaped platinum coin a phoenix. Commoners refer to the sovereign as a phoenix.
